overview: Dick Wager has almost 30 years of senior and executive-level management experience in both publicly and privately held healthcare companies. He also has founded or been a founding member and principal of several healthcare companies, including three institutional pharmacies; a multi-facility long-term care company with more than $100 million in annual revenues; a medical supply company; and a consulting firm. Dick has worked with acute and rehab hospitals, sub-acute units, skilled nursing facilities, home healthcare, retirement centers, assisted living facilities, MRDD facilities, day care centers, and institutional pharmacies. A sought after public speaker, he is a licensed nursing home administrator in the state of Tennessee and a certified administrator with the American College of Healthcare Administrators.
